item.rel_title: Forecasting the Cumulative Number of COVID-19 Deaths in China: Can More Lives Be Saved?
item.rel_abs: The COVID-19 outbreak is on-going in China. Here we estimated the potential total numbers of COVID-19 deaths in China, outside Hubei (in China), Hubei Province, Wuhan City and outside Wuhan (in Hubei) by Boltzmann function-based analyses, which are 3342 (95% CI, 3214, 3527), 111 (109, 114), 3245 (3100, 3423), 2613 (2498, 2767) and 627 (603, 654), respectively. The results may help to evaluate the severity of COVID-19 outbreaks and facilitate timely mental service for the families of passed patients.
item.rel_authors: Zhang, Z.; Long, C.; Yao, W.; Ying, Q.; Fu, X.
